values: 方式；方法；方面；手段；途径；路（用于街道名称）；道路；街道；巷道；路径；路线；方向；地区；地点；领域；条件；情况；状态；状况；通道；距离；（群体的）行为方式；生活方式；习俗；习惯；风格；作风；风度；态度；门路；手法；<古>职业；行当；愿望；意愿；<英>小街；巷；出入通道
非常；大量；远远地；十分；极其；很；确实；大大地；相当地；多么；完全地；彻底地

synonym.mean: 方法；道路；方向；行业；习惯

word_mean_info__list.difference: 通常指市区外可以通行各种机动车辆的交通干线。
指从此处通往彼处的路线、路程等。
在美国，指城市中一侧或两侧建筑物林立的大道或马路；而在英国则常指通住乡村大住宅、私人大庄园或两旁栽树的道路。
指人或兽在森林、荒野或山中踩出的小径或崎岖小道。
尤指城市中的道路，往往一侧或两侧有高大建筑物；还可指城市小镇、近郊可供人、车、马行走的平坦道路。
多指由人或动物在田间、小丘或树丛中经常走动而踩出的小路，也指公园或花园等供人走的小径。
高速公路，新词，特指为车辆快速通行而修的专线，美语为freeway或expressway。
普通用词，含义广泛，可指各种路、道或通道，也可指抽象的道路。
指连接两地间供行人或车辆使用的广阔平坦的大道，多指公路，也可用于引申意义。
在英国，多指街道两旁的人行道，而美国人常用sidewlk表示人行道。
指农村或城镇的小道或小径，也指小巷。
着重独特的程序或方式，尤指个人的偏爱或习惯。
指为达到某种目的或目标而采用的方法、手段或途径。
指从事某事的特别方法、途径。
普通用词，可指一般的方法，有时也指个人的方法或方式，也可指特殊的方式或方法。
指有系统、有条理地办事或解决问题的方法。
多指行动的特殊方式或独特的方法。
书面用词，常指因个人爱好或传统习俗等因素而遵循的方法。

word_group.phrase: go a long way towards doing sth.

word_group.brief_definition: 顺便说说, 顺便提起；在路上, 在途中
不论发生哪一种情况；无论怎样
迷路；不再有明确目标；迷失方向
已经开始, 在进行中

bilingual.source: Which is the fastest way to go?
This is the way I go to school.
What's the way to go to Qingdao?
The only way to stay in touch was.
bilingual.target: 唯一保持联系的方式是。
最便宜的方式是乘坐长途汽车。

bilingual.source: We must change our way of life.
bilingual.target: 我们必须改变我们的生活方式。

bilingual.source: He performed in this way for many years.
bilingual.target: 他以这种方式演出多年。

list.abstract: way（英[weɪ]，美[weɪ]），英文单词，作名词为方法；作风；道路。作形容词为途中的。作副词为大大地，远远地；非常。短语搭配有Milky Way（银河）。例句为”It's the best way to protect our world's most valuable natural resource.（这是保护我们世界上最宝贵的自然资源的最佳方式。）“ way相关近义词有path、method等。
《Way》是李昌燮演唱的一首歌曲，由李昌燮、MosPick作词作曲，于2018年12月11日发行。

yingyinNormal.en: It's not an effective way? What other way would you...
yingyinNormal.zh: 不是有效的方式？那你们还有什么其他方式...

yingyinNormal.en: Well, you've got a bloody odd way of showing it!
yingyinNormal.zh: 那你表现的方式真是奇怪！

yingyinNormal.en: That's a fancy way of saying you're a virgin.
yingyinNormal.zh: 用这种方式表明你还是处男挺酷炫的。

yingyinNormal.en: For them, there was no better way to show you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对他们而言，没有比这更好的表达方式了。

yingyinNormal.en: It was a way for me to speak for the dead.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我为死者代言的一种方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Anything else? No. No. I mean, he takes baths with his dog, but not in a weird way. Or a normal way; they both wear swimsuits.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还有吗？没了。没了。他和他的狗一起洗澡，但并不是以奇怪的方式。也不是正常方式；他们都穿泳衣。

yingyinNormal.en: IT technology and digital technology, is not the technology difference, is the difference of the way people think, the way people deal with the world.
yingyinNormal.zh: IT科技和数字科技，这不仅仅是不同的技术，而是人们思考方式的不同，人们对待这个世界方式的不同。

yingyinNormal.en: We live in a social world, where we do things as people favors as a part of reputation, the way we think of ourselves, the way they think of us is a social world.
yingyinNormal.zh: 一个具有社会性，我们需要做人们赞成的事，我们思考自己的方式，考虑别人的方式，这是社会性世界。

yingyinNormal.en: Hello. Welcome back. There's a nice way to say that, Karen.
yingyinNormal.zh: 欢迎回来。这表达方式真好啊，凯伦。

yingyinNormal.en: And we have to keep leading the global response, because the best way to stop this disease, the best way to keep Americans safe is to stop it at its source, in West Africa.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们必须领导全球性的响应，因为遏制这一疾病的最好方式，保护国人安全的最好方式是在源头西非上控制疫情。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm just not convinced it's the right way forward, to go backward.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我就是觉得走向未来不该用倒退的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Then why don't I remember her? You do remember her, in a way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那我为什么不记得她？你记得，以某种方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Tony, I do love you, you know, in my cold and unfeeling way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 托尼，我的确爱你，用我那种冷酷无情的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: They will. No. They don't like the way you've handled this.
yingyinNormal.zh: 他们会的。不会，他们不喜欢你处理这事的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: Of course I like quilting! It's the slowest way to make a blanket!
yingyinNormal.zh: 当然喜欢了！这是制作一床被子的最慢方式！

yingyinNormal.en: I want everything back the way it was. I can't say I care too much for the way you've rearranged my office.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要一切回归原状，我实在不太满意你重新摆设我办公室的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: No. No. I'm completely ordinary. That's right she is in the best way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不 我很正常。没错她就是，以最好的方式。

yingyinNormal.en: I agree she should die. But in the right way. At the right time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我同意她必须死，但要正确的方式，正确的时刻。

yingyinNormal.en: All right, now I'm gonna do this my way and I don't want to hear a peep out of you.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要照我的方式去做，你不准叽叽歪歪。

yingyinNormal.en: What a weird way to kick me when I'm down. No. No. I meant for the baby.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你落井下石的方式还真怪。我是说宝宝的名字。

exam_freq_info.chinese: (go a long way to doing)对...帮助很大

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道
n. 门口；门道；出入口；通道；门框；门拱；方法；途径；网关

word_family.mean: n. 方法；方式；路；道路；街道；巷；地区；地点；方面；条件；状况；船台；滑道

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: go a long way towards doing sth.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在某种程度上；在某些方面

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: go a long way to doing sth.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 通过...的方式；通过...的途径
在某种程度上；从某种意义上讲
通过痛苦的经历；通过出错；来之不易

sense_info_list.en: an action that can produce the result you want; a method

examination_example.sentence: Competition law appears to be the only <highlight>way</highlight> to address these imbalances of power.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 竞争法似乎是解决这些权力不平衡的唯一途径。

examination_example.sentence: But there is also a different <highlight>way</highlight> to look at the data.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是也有一种不同的方式来看待数据。

examination_example.sentence: Although technology might change the <highlight>way</highlight> we react, it hasn't changed our nature.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然技术可能会改变我们的反应方式，但它并没有改变我们的本性。

sense_info_list.en: a particular aspect of something; a respect

examination_example.sentence: In some <highlight>ways</highlight> it has been very successful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某些方面，它非常成功。

examination_example.sentence: In some <highlight>ways</highlight>, this quest for commonalities defines science.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在某种程度上，对共性的追求定义了科学。

examination_example.sentence: First, they can shut things down without suffering much in the <highlight>way</highlight> of consequences.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 首先，他们可以在不承受太多后果的情况下关闭系统。

sense_info_list.en: the course traveled from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: California is leading the <highlight>way</highlight>, as it does on so many climate efforts, in figuring out the details.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 加州在解决细节方面走在了前面，就像它在许多气候问题上所做的那样。

examination_example.sentence: It could be your commute to work, a trip into town or the <highlight>way</highlight> home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可以是你上班通勤路上，进城的旅行或回家的路。

examination_example.sentence: I want to share these old truths I've learned along the <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想分享这些我一路上学到的老道理。

sense_info_list.en: distance in time or space

examination_example.sentence: Even dairy farms, where robots do a small share of milking, have a long <highlight>way</highlight> to go before they're automated.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 即使在奶牛养殖场，机器人也只能承担一小部分的挤奶工作，在实现自动化之前还有很漫长 的道路要走。

examination_example.sentence: While there's a long <highlight>way</highlight> to go, the trend lines for renewables are spiking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然还有很长的路要走，但可再生能源的趋势线正在飙升。

examination_example.sentence: Some of their ties go back a long <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们的一些关系可以追溯到很久以前。

sense_info_list.en: a specified direction

examination_example.sentence: The human systems and the landscapes we live on are linked, and the interactions go both <highlight>ways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人类系统和我们赖以生存的景观是相互联系的，相互作用是双向的。

examination_example.sentence: It would lose its <highlight>way</highlight> as it had with widespread illegal telephone hacking.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能会迷失方向，正如其在普遍的非法电话窃听事件中一样。

examination_example.sentence: Television is a one-<highlight>way</highlight> tap flowing into our homes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 电视是流入我们家庭的单向水龙头。

sense_info_list.en: a means of entry or exit from somewhere, such as a door or gate

examination_example.sentence: Thankfully, there is a <highlight>way</highlight> out of this trap – but it involves striking a subtle balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令人欣慰的是，有一条出路可以走出这个陷阱——但这需要达成微妙的平衡。

examination_example.sentence: Head toward these breaks to find a <highlight>way</highlight> out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 朝这些缺口前进，寻找出路。

sense_info_list.zh: (go a long way to doing)对...帮助很大

examination_example.sentence: It requires minimal effort and goes a long <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这费不了多少工夫，而且会有很大的帮助。

examination_example.sentence: This one may be a bit more difficult to pull off, but it can go a long <highlight>way</highlight> to achieving results.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一个可能有点难完成，但它可以对实现结果有很大帮助。

sense_info_list.en: the route along which someone or something is moving

examination_example.sentence: People should look to intangible qualities like character and intellect rather than dieting their <highlight>way</highlight> to size zero or wasp-waist physiques.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 人们应该关注像性格和智力这样的无形品质，而不是节食减肥到零号身材或蜂腰身材。

examination_example.sentence: A discovery claim works its <highlight>way</highlight> through the community.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项科学发现声明争取获得科学界认可。

examination_example.sentence: New research on transportation biofuels is already under <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 运输生物燃料的新研究已经在进行中。

examination_example.sentence: Everything he achieved in life was earned the hard <highlight>way</highlight> and his success in the literary field was no exception.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他一生中所取得的一切都是通过艰苦的努力获得的，他在文学领域的成功也不例外。

sense_info_list.en: a road, track, path, or street for travelling along;
by a large amount

word_usage.usage: 表示“某种程度上“时，way一般与介词in搭配。如：in a way 在某种程度上。

“经由某个地点”可用by way of表达。
示例：The artist recently arrived in Paris from Bulgaria by way of Vienna.
最近这位艺术家从保加利亚途经维也纳到了巴黎。
be under way指某事已经在进行中，相当于be underway。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指各种道路，有时指大道，用途最广。
常指较远的路线，可能包括若干段路程。
常指溪流、天体等自然形成的轨道。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 路程; 距离; 一段时间
(go a long way towards doing)(对做某事)帮助很大

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道（同RAILWAY）
n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道

word_family.mean: n. 方法；方式；路；道路；街道；巷；地区；地点；方面；条件；状况；船台；滑道

word_level_phrase_info.phrase: go a long way towards doing sth.

sense_info_list.en: a method, style or manner of doing something

examination_example.sentence: An attitude is a settled <highlight>way</highlight> of thinking, feeling and/or behaving towards particular objects, people, events or ideologies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 态度是对特定对象、人、事件或意识形态的一种固定的思考、感觉和行为方式。

examination_example.sentence: One of the most effective <highlight>ways</highlight> to change attitude is to start behaving as if you already think the way you'd prefer to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 改变态度最有效的方法之一就是开始表现得好像你已经按照自己喜欢的方式去思考。

examination_example.sentence: An extra 2 billion people will need new places to live, services and <highlight>ways</highlight> to move around their cities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另外20亿人口将需要新的地方去生活、服务以及在城市中活动的方式。

examination_example.sentence: Should we change the <highlight>way</highlight> math is taught in schools, or eliminate some courses entirely?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们应该改变学校的数学教学方式，还是完全取消一些课程？

examination_example.sentence: The robots have provided major benefits to farmers in various <highlight>ways</highlight>, from hunting and pulling weeds to monitoring the condition of every single fruit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 机器人以各种方式为农民提供了巨大利益，包括从打猎和拔草到监测每一种水果的状况。

examination_example.sentence: Either <highlight>way</highlight>, taxpayers have no business paying for students' college education.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论哪种方式，纳税人都不应该支付学生大学教育的费用。

sense_info_list.en: the route along which someone or something is moving

examination_example.sentence: What happened to David on his <highlight>way</highlight> back from the hospital?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大卫从医院回来的路上发生了什么？

examination_example.sentence: So apart from that, what else gets in the <highlight>way</highlight> of procedural compliance?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 那么除此之外，还有什么会阻碍程序合规性呢？

examination_example.sentence: Parking sensors, sound systems, and navigation apps which will show a <highlight>way</highlight> around upcoming traffic jams.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 停车传感器、音响系统和导航应用将为即将到来的交通堵塞提供指引。

sense_info_list.en: a noticeable point

examination_example.sentence: Many teenagers are so obsessed with star chasing that they may imitate their idols in every <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多青少年痴迷于追星，他们可能会在各个方面模仿自己的偶像。

examination_example.sentence: However advanced the CGI technology is, the recreated image will differ in a <highlight>way</highlight> from the real actor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 无论计算机成像技术（CGI）多么先进，重建的图像在某种程度上还是与真实的演员不同。

examination_example.sentence: In many <highlight>ways</highlight>, human beings are built to draw.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在很多方面，人类天生就是为了画画。

examination_example.sentence: This insight explains why we look the other <highlight>way</highlight> when our parents say something offensive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这一深刻见解解释了为什么当我们的父母说一些冒犯性的话的时候，我们会看另一个方向。

examination_example.sentence: For instance, years with larger increase in online usage were followed by years with lower wellbeing , rather than the other <highlight>way</highlight> around.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，网络使用量的大幅增加的那些年份会伴随着接下来数年的幸福感的降低，反过来却不是如此。

sense_info_list.en: the course traveled from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: But when everyone has perfect information, traffic jams simply spread onto the side roads that seem to offer a <highlight>way</highlight> round them.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是，当每个人都有完美的信息时，交通堵塞就会蔓延到似乎提供了一条绕过它们的路的辅道上。

sense_info_list.en: distance in time or space
sense_info_list.zh: 路程; 距离; 一段时间

examination_example.sentence: This teaches them to be understanding of and sympathetic towards others—qualities sure to take them a long <highlight>way</highlight> in life.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这教导他们理解和同情他人，这些品质一定能让他们的人生之路走得长远。

examination_example.sentence: The ubiquitous (无所不在的) battery has already come a long <highlight>way</highlight>, of course.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毋庸置疑，无处不在的电池经历了漫长的发展过程。

examination_example.sentence: To be sure, the battery still has a long <highlight>way</highlight> to go before the nightly recharge completely replaces the weekly trip to the gas station.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当然，如果想让汽车充一宿电就能开走，而不必每周都得去加油站加油，前路仍然是道阻且长。

sense_info_list.zh: (go a long way towards doing)(对做某事)帮助很大

examination_example.sentence: Acknowledging this will go a long <highlight>way</highlight> towards suggesting that you might be the right person for the position you are applying for.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 承认这一点对暗示你可能是你所申请职位的合适人选大有帮助。

examination_example.sentence: The waste has been put down to burning old cosmetic stock to make <highlight>way</highlight> for their new beauty range.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了给他们的新化妆品系列让路，这些垃圾被用来焚烧旧化妆品库存。

examination_example.sentence: You think life is wonderful and expect it to stay that <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你认为生活是美好的，并希望它保持这个样子。

word_usage.usage:
on the way to表示“在去…的路上”。
在表示具体地点的名词前须加物主代词或定冠词the，如：
the way to the office 
the way to his house
在表示抽象意义的名词前则不加物主代词或定冠词，如：
the way to work
the way to school
在表示地点的副词前介词to也省略，如：
the way home

the way表示“…的方式”时，后面可用定语从句修饰，此时引导从句的关系代词或关系副词往往省略。
示例：这就是我做的方式。
误 This is the way how I do it.
正 This is the way I do it.
正 This is how I do it.

in no way表示“绝不”，位于句首时，句子应部分倒装。
In no way can you give away the secret. 
你绝不能把这个秘密泄露出去。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 路程; 距离; 一段时间

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道（同RAILWAY）
n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道
adv. & adj. 中途；中间；朝中间；中间道路的；折中的
adj. 正在进行中的；起步的；航行中的

word_family.mean: n. 方法；方式；路；道路；街道；巷；地区；地点；方面；条件；状况；船台；滑道

sense_info_list.en: an action that can produce the result you want; a method

examination_example.sentence: For example, consumers could use appliances in a more efficient <highlight>way</highlight> by adjusting the time of cooking to the type of food.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，消费者可以根据食物类型调整烹饪时间，从而提高微波炉使用效率。

examination_example.sentence: For example, over the centuries, they have simulated (模拟) dialogues in a number of <highlight>ways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 比如，几个世纪以来，教科书已经通过多种方式模拟了对话。

examination_example.sentence: Among human populations, culture not only affects the <highlight>way</highlight> we live, but also writes itself into our genes, affecting who we are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在人类群体中，文化不仅影响我们的生活方式，还会写入我们的基因，影响我们的样子。

examination_example.sentence: A new technology has the potential to change modern society in radical <highlight>ways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项新技术有可能以激进的方式改变现代社会。

examination_example.sentence: For thousands of years, people have known that the best <highlight>way</highlight> to understand a concept is to explain it to someone else.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 几千年来人们一直都清楚，理解一个概念最好的方式就是向别人解释这个概念。

examination_example.sentence: It helps students understand in a <highlight>way</highlight> that you can't do with print homework assignments.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它帮助学生理解的方式，是你用打印作业无法做到的。

examination_example.sentence: Now educators are experimenting with <highlight>ways</highlight> to apply this model to academic subjects.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 现在，教育工作者正在研究如何将这种模式应用于学术科目。

examination_example.sentence: Read books, go to movies, take on new hobbies or activities that force one to think in novel <highlight>ways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 读书、看电影，培养一些新的爱好或活动，这些都能迫使你以全新的方式思考。

examination_example.sentence: They're documenting why teaching is such a fruitful <highlight>way</highlight> to learn, and designing innovative <highlight>ways</highlight> for young people to engage in instruction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们正在研究为什么通过教学来学习会如此富有成效，并开创新方法让年轻人参与到这一过程当中。

sense_info_list.en: the route along which someone or something is moving

examination_example.sentence: It may get in the <highlight>way</highlight> of enhancing one's social status.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它可能会妨碍人提高自己的社会地位。

examination_example.sentence: Drivers on their <highlight>way</highlight> to the Polish capital of Warsaw on Wednesday morning found the road blocked by an unusual obstacle.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 周三上午，司机们在前往波兰首都华沙的路上发现道路被一个不同寻常的障碍物。

examination_example.sentence: When ships power their <highlight>way</highlight> through the ocean, they pump exhaust into the atmosphere, just as cars do.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当船只在海洋上行驶时，它们会像汽车一样将废气排放到大气中。

sense_info_list.en: a noticeable point

examination_example.sentence: Indeed, the streets of San Jose seem, in some <highlight>ways</highlight>, to embody the best of America.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，在某些方面，圣何塞的街道似乎体现了美国最好的一面。

examination_example.sentence: Her biggest concern is the emphasis American culture places on thinness and the negative <highlight>ways</highlight> that this affects girls today.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她最担心的是美国文化对瘦的强调以及这种情况对当今女孩的负面影响。

examination_example.sentence: We do not spend nearly enough time trying to concentrate on achieving a sort of calmness, a sort of contentment in a mental <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们没有花足够的时间去集中精力实现一种平静，一种精神方面的满足。

examination_example.sentence: They move around clumsily, drifting within the small confines of the cage, and do their best to figure out which <highlight>way</highlight> is up.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们在笼子狭小的空间里笨拙地移动，悬浮在空中，并且竭力想知道哪条路是向上的。

examination_example.sentence: Before we collectively tear our hair out—how are we supposed to find our <highlight>way</highlight> in a landscape this confusing?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在我们集体焦虑之前—我们应该如何在如此混乱的环境中找到自己的路？

sense_info_list.en: distance in time or space
sense_info_list.zh: 路程; 距离; 一段时间

examination_example.sentence: Rural kids used to walk a long <highlight>way</highlight> to school in the old days.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 以前，农村孩子上学要走很长一段路。

examination_example.sentence: There is still some <highlight>way</highlight> to go to ensure women are rising through the ranks to higher grade positions and being paid appropriately.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 要确保女性逐步晋升到更高的职位并获得适当的薪酬，还有一段路要走。

examination_example.sentence: There's no question people can take things a long <highlight>way</highlight> toward reversing diabetes, reversing high blood pressure, even preventing cancer by food choices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毫无疑问，人们在通过事物选择来逆转糖尿病、逆转高血压，甚至预防癌症方还有很长的路要走。

sense_info_list.en: a special or personal manner of behaving
personal choice as to situation or behavior

examination_example.sentence: But it wasn't always that <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但事情并不总是这样的。

examination_example.sentence: Desktops—which keep doctors from bedsides—are fast giving <highlight>way</highlight> to wireless devices.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让医生远离床沿的台式机正迅速让位于无线设备。

word_usage.usage:
in no way表示“绝不”，位于句首时，句子应部分倒装。
In no way can you give away the secret. 
你绝不能把这个秘密泄露出去。

on the way to表示“在去…的路上”。
在表示具体地点的名词前须加物主代词或定冠词the，如：
the way to the office 
the way to his house
在表示抽象意义的名词前则不加物主代词或定冠词，如：
the way to work
the way to school
在表示地点的副词前介词to也省略，如：
the way home

the way表示“…的方式”时，后面可用定语从句修饰，此时引导从句的关系代词或关系副词往往省略。
示例：这就是我做的方式。
误 This is the way how I do it.
正 This is the way I do it.
正 This is how I do it.

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 顺便说说；顺便提起；在路上；在途中

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 正在进行中的；起步的；航行中的
n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道（同RAILWAY）
n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道

word_family.mean: n. 方法；方式；路；道路；街道；巷；地区；地点；方面；条件；状况；船台；滑道

sense_info_list.en: an action that can produce the result you want; a method

examination_example.sentence: Another <highlight>way</highlight> to hide a message is to use symbols to stand for specific letters of the alphabet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 另一种隐藏信息的方法是使用符号来代表字母表中的特定字母。

examination_example.sentence: This text is about how to buy and cook fish in an easy <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这篇文章是关于如何以简单的方式购买和烹饪鱼。

examination_example.sentence: We must find <highlight>ways</highlight> to protect our environment.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们必须想办法保护环境。

examination_example.sentence: Experts say the <highlight>way</highlight> you design your home could play a role in whether you pack on the pounds or keep them off.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 专家表示，你设计房子的方式可能会对你是否会发胖产生影响。

sense_info_list.en: the route along which someone or something is moving

examination_example.sentence: In a 2014 study, Elizabeth Dunn, associate professor of psychology at UBC, invited people on their <highlight>way</highlight> into a coffee shop.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在2014年的一项研究中，英属哥伦比亚大学心理学副教授伊丽莎白·邓恩邀请人们前往咖啡店。

examination_example.sentence: Sitting back in the car on the <highlight>way</highlight> to the airport, I figured it all out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在去机场的路上，我坐在车里，想明白了一切。

examination_example.sentence: About 30 percent of the world's export of tea makes its <highlight>way</highlight> to London.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 世界上大约30%的茶叶出口到伦敦。

sense_info_list.en: a special or personal manner of behaving

examination_example.sentence: In the <highlight>way</highlight> they act and react.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们行动和反应的方式。

examination_example.sentence: We have high expectations of them, but they might behave differently in <highlight>ways</highlight> that humans just instinctively (直觉地) know how other humans react.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们对它们有很高的期望，但它们可能会以人类本能的方式表现出不同的行为，即直觉地知道其他人类的反应。

examination_example.sentence: I recommend that you find your <highlight>way</highlight> in style.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我建议你找到自己的风格。

examination_example.sentence: It took us about 3 hours to go all the <highlight>way</highlight> around the Xi'an City Wall.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们沿西安城墙走一圈，大约花了3个小时。

examination_example.sentence: I composed my lectures on the <highlight>way</highlight>, and that was all the thinking time I had.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我在路上写了讲稿，那是我唯一的思考时间。

examination_example.sentence: After a short <highlight>way</highlight>, the farmer stopped and pointed at a weed which we missed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走了一小段路后，农夫停下脚步，指着我们错过的一片杂草。

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>way</highlight> they are less exciting, though.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过那样的话，（球赛）就没那么令人兴奋了。

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>way</highlight>, you will avoid potential time delays in getting to your classes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，您就可以避免上课的潜在时间延迟。

examination_example.sentence: That <highlight>way</highlight>, cattlemen will know whether they need to move their cattle to another field for nutrition purposes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这样，养牛人就能知道是否需要为了营养而把牛转移到另一片田地。

sense_info_list.en: a noticeable point

examination_example.sentence: If you talk about fashion, you are talking about China and how young designers and models are finally acknowledging that in many <highlight>ways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你谈论时尚，你谈论的就是中国，以及年轻的设计师和模特们最终如何在很多方面得到认可。

examination_example.sentence: “You can go such a long <highlight>way</highlight> to make things that look professional but still have your own voice.”
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你可以“走很长一段路”，让事情看起来很专业，但又保留有你自己的特色。

examination_example.sentence: “They're humanlike in their looks and the <highlight>way</highlight> they sound, but that in itself is not being human, ” she says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说：“他们长得很像人，发音方式也很像人，但他们不是人”。

examination_example.sentence: Anneke understands how fear can get in the <highlight>way</highlight> of so many things people dream of doing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Anneke明白了恐惧是如何阻碍人们完成梦想之事的。

examination_example.sentence: As a <highlight>way</highlight> out, I decided to get up two hours before my usual time.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 作为出路，我决定比平时早两个小时起床。

word_usage.usage:
①跟不定式：They had no way to communicate with Kate.他们没有办法和凯特交流。
②跟of+doing：The professor had a way of making his classes lively and interesting.教授有一个使他的课生动有趣的方法。
③跟从句：I don't like the way (that/in which) he looks at me.我不喜欢他看我的方式。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 以此方式；这样；在这途中
顺便说说；顺便提起；在路上；在途中
不论发生哪一种情况；无论怎样
迷路；不再有明确目标；迷失方向
漫长的道路；漫长的路；长路
不同方式；不同方法、不同途径；不同的路

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 铁路；铁道；铁路系统；铁道部门；轨道

word_family.mean: n. 方法；方式；路；道路；街道；巷；地区；地点；方面；条件；状况；船台；滑道

sense_info_list.en: an action that can produce the result you want; a method

examination_example.sentence: However, the Internet is changing the <highlight>way</highlight> students learn.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，互联网正在改变学生的学习方式。

examination_example.sentence: Nowadays, according to different processing <highlight>ways</highlight>, there are mainly four kinds of Chinese tea.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如今，根据加工方式的不同，中国茶叶主要有四种。

examination_example.sentence: Before people developed writing, storytelling was the most important <highlight>way</highlight> to pass along information.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在人们发明书写之前，讲故事是传递信息最重要的方式。

sense_info_list.en: the course traveled from one place to another

examination_example.sentence: Here is some advice on how to ask the <highlight>way</highlight> in a foreign country.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这里有一些在国外如何问路的建议。

examination_example.sentence: He could find the <highlight>way</highlight> home though he was only three years old.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然他只有三岁，但他能找到回家的路。

examination_example.sentence: One day, on my <highlight>way</highlight> home from school, my bike was broken.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 有一天，在我放学回家的路上，我的自行车坏了。

sense_info_list.en: a noticeable point

examination_example.sentence: According to Adrien, in what <highlight>way</highlight> is China similar to France?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据Adrien的说法，中国在哪些方面与法国相似？

examination_example.sentence: Exercise helps in two <highlight>ways</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 锻炼有两方面的帮助。

examination_example.sentence: He treated his patients as friends in every <highlight>way</highlight> possible.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他尽一切可能把病人当作朋友。

examination_example.sentence: By the <highlight>way</highlight>, Who will you invite ?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 顺便问一下，你要邀请谁？

examination_example.sentence: I am used to having high standards when I choose where to stay, by the <highlight>way</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 顺便说一下，当我选择住在哪里时，我已经习惯了选择高标准住宿。

examination_example.sentence: By the <highlight>way</highlight>, do you have a pet?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 顺便问一下，你有宠物吗？

examination_example.sentence: Which <highlight>way</highlight> was the wind blowing？
examination_example.sentence_trans: 风往哪个方向吹?

word_usage.usage:
on the way to表示“在去…的路上”。
在表示具体地点的名词前须加物主代词或定冠词the，如：
the way to the office 
the way to his house
在表示抽象意义的名词前则不加物主代词或定冠词，如：
the way to work
the way to school
在表示地点的副词前介词to也省略，如：
the way home

the way表示“…的方式”时，后面可用定语从句修饰，此时引导从句的关系代词或关系副词往往省略。
示例：这就是我做的方式。
误 This is the way how I do it.
正 This is the way I do it.
正 This is how I do it.

in no way表示“绝不”，位于句首时，句子应部分倒装。
In no way can you give away the secret. 
你绝不能把这个秘密泄露出去。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 指有系统、有条理地办事或解决问题的方法。
普通用词，可指做某事或达成某事的方法，也可指某事发生的方式。
指为达到某种目的或目标而采用的方法、手段或途径。
